Uses of Package
com.continuuity.weave.api

Packages that use com.continuuity.weave.api
com.continuuity.weave.api Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Weave library. 
com.continuuity.weave.yarn Classes in this package implement the Weave API for Apache Hadoop YARN. 
com.continuuity.weave.yarn.utils   
 

Classes in com.continuuity.weave.api used by com.continuuity.weave.api
Command
          Represents command objects.
Command.Builder
          Builder for creating Command object.
EventHandler
          A callback handler for acting on application events related to WeaveRunnable lifecycle events.
EventHandler.TimeoutAction
          Represents action to act upon runnable launch timeout.
EventHandler.TimeoutEvent
          This class holds information about a launch timeout event.
EventHandlerContext
          Represents runtime context for EventHandler.
EventHandlerSpecification
          Specification for EventHandler.
LocalFile
          This interface represents a local file that will be available for the container running a WeaveRunnable.
ResourceReport
          This interface provides a snapshot of the resources an application is using broken down by each runnable.
ResourceSpecification
          This interface provides specifications for resource requirements including set and get methods for number of cores, amount of memory, and number of instances.
ResourceSpecification.Builder.AfterDownlink
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.AfterInstances
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.AfterMemory
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.AfterUplink
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.Build
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.CoreSetter
           
ResourceSpecification.Builder.MemorySetter
           
ResourceSpecification.SizeUnit
          Unit for specifying memory size.
RunId
          Represents the unique ID of a particular execution.
RuntimeSpecification
          Specifications for runtime requirements.
SecureStore
          Represents storage of secure tokens.
ServiceAnnouncer
          This interface provides a way to announce the availability of a service.
ServiceController
          This interface is for controlling a remote running service.
WeaveApplication
          Represents a application that can be launched by Weave.
WeaveContext
          Represents the runtime context of a WeaveRunnable.
WeaveController
          For controlling a running application.
WeavePreparer
          This interface exposes methods to set up the Weave runtime environment and start a Weave application.
WeaveRunnable
          The WeaveRunnable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed in a Weave cluster.
WeaveRunnableSpecification
          Represents a specification of a WeaveRunnable.
WeaveRunnableSpecification.Builder.AfterConfigs
           
WeaveRunnableSpecification.Builder.AfterName
           
WeaveRunnableSpecification.Builder.NameSetter
           
WeaveRunner
          This interface prepares execution of WeaveRunnable and WeaveApplication.
WeaveRunner.LiveInfo
          Interface to represents information of a live application.
WeaveRunResources
          Information about the container the WeaveRunnable is running in.
WeaveSpecification
          Represents specification of a WeaveApplication.
WeaveSpecification.Builder.AfterName
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.AfterOrder
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.AfterRunnable
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.FirstOrder
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.LocalFileAdder
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.MoreFile
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.MoreRunnable
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.NameSetter
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.NextOrder
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.RunnableSetter
           
WeaveSpecification.Builder.RuntimeSpecificationAdder
          For setting runtime specific settings.
WeaveSpecification.Order
          Defines execution order.
WeaveSpecification.Order.Type
